content: करटः [किरति मदं, कॄ-अटन् <ls>Uṇ. 4. 81</ls>] {@--1@} An elephant's cheek. {@--2@} Safflower. {@--3@} A crow; <ls>Śānti. 4. 19.</ls> {@--4@} An atheist, unbeliever. {@--5@} A degraded Brāhmaṇa {@--6@} A man of a low profession. {@--7@} A musical instrument. {@--8@} The first Śrāddha ceremony performed in honor of a dead man. --टा {@--1@} An elephant's cheek. {@--2@} A cow difficult to be milked.
